story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0100:
According to Blue and the others, Giovanni should
be up ahead.
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0200:
Why’d he come here, of all places? It’s freezing...
The cold might slow us down.
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0300:
Hmph! Really, you think you have the right to
complain when you just got here? What about us?
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0500:
Yeah, put yourself in our shoes! We’ve been
waiting out here for you this entire time!
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0600:
Unbelievable. You didn’t give any consideration to
our well-being and sure took your sweet time
getting here!
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0700:
Oh dear. That was quite rude of us... Perhaps we
should apologize.
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_0900: All right, we’re goin’ all out right off the bat!
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1200: We didn’t even slow them down... I’m sorry, boss!
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1300:
Wow, that was amazing! It was over in the blink
of an eye!
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1400:
We can’t really afford to lose time over something
as trivial as this.
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1600:
Their battle styles were completely different,
weren’t they.
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1700:
Misty’s Vaporeon stormed right in like a wave
and took their attacks like it was nothing...
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1800:
And Erika’s Leafeon kept calmly observing the
situation until it found the right time to strike!
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_1900:
One going on the offensive with the other calmly
observing... That fits Misty and Erika perfectly.
I guess Pokémon really do take after their Trainers.
story_teamrocket_01_18000/2401_1201_2000:
I guess you’re right! And it looks like we can learn
a lot from being around them!
